message:
Application Update

{{doc.stage}}

Dear Team,

Status Update
Current Stage: {{doc.stage}} Updated On: {{ frappe.utils.format_datetime(doc.modified, "HH:mm:ss dd-MM-yyyy") }}
Project Details
Project Title: {{doc.proposal_name}} Proposal ID: {{doc.name}} {% if doc.start_date and doc.end_date%} Duration: {{doc.grant_duration_in_months}} {{ "months" if doc.grant_duration_in_months > 1 else "month" }} Timeline: {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.start_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") }} to {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.end_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") }} {% endif%}
View Application Details

Best regards,
The {{doc.donor_name}} mGrant Team

© {{ frappe.utils.getdate().year }} {{doc.donor_name}}. All rights reserved.

For support, contact: {{doc.donor_email}}

Best regards,
The {{doc.donor_name}} mGrant Team

© {{ frappe.utils.getdate().year }} {{doc.donor_name}}. All rights reserved.
